name: ngrx-normalizr
description: Normalizing state reducer for ngrx applications

scripts.prepublishOnly: yarn tsc && yarn docs && yarn docs-github
scripts.docs: rm -rf ./docs && typedoc --out ./docs --name ngrx-normalizr --readme ./README.md --module commonjs --target ES5 --theme default

author: Michael Krone <michael.krone@outlook.com>
